metadata.title: CVE-2015-0852 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple integer underflows in PluginPCX.cpp in FreeImage 3.17.0 andearlier allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap memorycorruption) via vectors related to the height and width of a window.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0852` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libfreeimage3 - 3.15.4-4.2
libfreeimageplus3 - 3.15.4-4.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freeimage package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.15.4-4.2').
